title: Office working hours change to avoid road congestion?
content: A change in working hours in offices will to come up for discussion tomorrow (21) at the National Labour Advisory Council, says labour minister Nimal Siripala de Silva.The aim of the suggested move is to address vehicular congestion on the roads.At its meeting at the finance ministry, the NLAC will also deliberate on matters pertaining to the surcharge tax and the VAT as well as the Employeesâ€™ Trust Fund, the minister adds.
